name: Todo List App should allow me to add todo items
title: Todo List App should allow me to add todo items

testSteps.description: Serena starts with an empty todo list

children.description: Serena ensures that website title does equal 'Serenity/JS TodoApp'

testSteps.description: Serena records an item called 'buy some cheese'

children.description: Serena enters 'buy some cheese' into "What needs to be done?" input box
Serena presses key Enter in "What needs to be done?" input box
Serena waits up to 5s, polling every 500ms, until displayed items does contain 'buy some cheese'

testSteps.description: Serena ensures that displayed items does equal [ 'buy some cheese' ]
Serena records an item called 'feed the cat'

children.description: Serena enters 'feed the cat' into "What needs to be done?" input box
Serena presses key Enter in "What needs to be done?" input box
Serena waits up to 5s, polling every 500ms, until displayed items does contain 'feed the cat'

testSteps.description: Serena ensures that displayed items does equal [ 'buy some cheese', 'feed the cat' ]
Serena ensures that persisted items does equal displayed items
